definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 41:36 food (Ar. 0’uklun, Aram. [[אוּכְלָא]], 0uklo0, As. akalu Dl:w, Eth.0akl:)—´[[א]] abs. Ge 41:35 + ; cstr. Ge 41:35, Ge 41:48; sf. [[אָכְלֶָךָ]] Le 25:37; [[אָכְלו]] Mal 1:12, etc.;—Hex mostly JED, not Ez.—food, food-supply, esp. cereals of store in Egypt Ge 41:35, Ge 41:35 + 12 t. Ge 41-44; Ge 47:24 cf. Ge 14:11(JE); also Le 11:34, Le 25:37 (P) De 2:6, De 2:28 (D); ´[[נֶשֶׁךְ א]] usury of food De 23:20 (D) (‖[[כֶּסֶף]] ´[[נ]], etc.); [[לְעֵת הָאׂבֶל]] at meal-time Ru 2:14; † poet. 17 t.;—food Ps 107:18; of offerings Mal 1:12; partic. food Job 12:11 (as tasted); Job 36:31 (as given by God) so Ps 145:15; [[לְהָשִׁיב נָפֶָשׁ]] ´[[א]] La 1:11 cf. v:La 1:19; esp. cereals Pr 13:23, Joe 1:16, Hb Hab 3:17; but also flesh Ps 78:18, Ps 78:30; of food (prey) of wild animals Ps 104:21 (‖[[טרף]]):Ps 104:27; of prey of eagles Job 9:26, Job 39:29; ravens Job 38:41.
